actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations

official_title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to permit the transportation, mailing, and broadcasting of advertising, information, and materials concerning lotteries authorized by law and conducted by a nonprofit organization, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Federal criminal code to permit the transportation or mailing of materials concerning lotteries conducted by nonprofit organizations in accordance with State law.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to permit the transportation, mailing, and broadcasting of advertising, information, and materials concerning lotteries authorized by law and conducted by a nonprofit organization, and for other purposes.
